mapper.select: SELECT faq_id, category, question, answer, created_at, updated_at FROM faq ORDER BY faq_id
SELECT faq_id, category, question, answer, created_at, updated_at FROM faq WHERE category = #{category} ORDER BY faq_id

SELECT faq_id, category, question, answer, created_at, updated_at FROM faq WHERE LOWER(question) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%' OR LOWER(answer) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%' ORDER BY faq_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faq (faq_id, category, question, answer, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{faq_id}, #{category}, #{question}, #{answer}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE faq SET category = #{category}, question = #{question}, answer = #{answer}, updated_at = SYSDATE WHERE faq_id = #{faq_id}
